24 #ifndef _BGPSTREAM_INPUT_H
25 #define _BGPSTREAM_INPUT_H
26 
27 #include "bgpstream_constants.h"
28 #include <stdbool.h>
29 
30 
31 
32 typedef struct struct_bgpstream_input_t {
33  struct struct_bgpstream_input_t *next;
34  char *filename; // name of bgpdump
35  char *fileproject; // bgpdump project
36  char *filecollector; // bgpdump collector
37  char *filetype; // type of bgpdump (rib or update)
38  int epoch_filetime; // timestamp associated to the time the bgp data was generated
39  int time_span;
40 } bgpstream_input_t;
41 
42 
43 typedef enum {
44  BGPSTREAM_INPUT_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_INPUT_QUEUE,
45  BGPSTREAM_INPUT_MGR_STATUS_NON_EMPTY_INPUT_QUEUE
46 } bgpstream_input_mgr_status_t;
47 
48 typedef struct struct_bgpstream_input_mgr_t {
49  bgpstream_input_t *head;
50  bgpstream_input_t *tail;
51  bgpstream_input_t *last_to_process;
52  bgpstream_input_mgr_status_t status;
53  int epoch_minimum_date;
54  int epoch_last_ts_input;
55 } bgpstream_input_mgr_t;
56 
57 
58 /* prototypes */
59 bgpstream_input_mgr_t *bgpstream_input_mgr_create();
60 bool bgpstream_input_mgr_is_empty(const bgpstream_input_mgr_t * const bs_input_mgr);
61 int bgpstream_input_mgr_push_sorted_input(bgpstream_input_mgr_t * const bs_input_mgr,
62  char * filename, char * fileproject,
63  char * filecollector, char * const filetype,
64  const int epoch_filetime, const int time_span);
65 bgpstream_input_t *bgpstream_input_mgr_get_queue_to_process(bgpstream_input_mgr_t * const bs_input_mgr);
66 void bgpstream_input_mgr_destroy_queue(bgpstream_input_t *queue);
67 void bgpstream_input_mgr_destroy(bgpstream_input_mgr_t *bs_input_mgr);
68

70 #endif /* _BGPSTREAM_INPUT_H */
